website_summaries.verdict: This camera captures breathtaking 5.6K photos and impressive videos, and it is so simple to use, anyone can create magic with it.

customer_reviews.title: Could become the best gopro ever
customer_reviews.text: Ok the go pro max is a legitimate camera stitching is very good quality of footage is fantastic only things I hope we get with software updates down the line is 1st 2.7k hero mode. That would about end me needing a hero gopro for any vlogging the 1440 resolution is just not with todays standard. And 2nd I hope we get some slow motion in 360! Thats hard to believe that it is not in the software with the camera. The max is bare really with features compared to the hero 8. But If you want a fantastic camera and a really easy to edit this is a no brainers
customer_reviews.author: John bingo

customer_reviews.title: Stabilization is AMAZING!  Zero gimbal needed.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Slight learning curve from Hero 7 and 5. The ability to use as a hero8 or 7 with either lens is appealing. The 360 capabilities are years ahead of its time. Reframing software by GoPro available on Mac and mobile. GoPro is developing and testing the Windows 360 software as of the time of this review. Lastly the horizon lock capability creates next level stabilization without the need for a gimbal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Android Phones if you want to Edit 360
customer_reviews.text: Seems cool but couldn't get it to work with a Google Pixel 3XL and priority support took 5 days to tell me they "think" my phone doesn't support 360 footage, which I doubt because it's a highly capable phone and within the requirements recomended on their site. Either way I had to return it, wish it would have worked and wish support was more knowledge to help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas. I have been wanting a Go Pro forever. This unit rocks. Easy to use. Takes 360 pictures, time lapse and super high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Spa Girl

customer_reviews.title: BF loves it
customer_reviews.text: My bf loves the 360 function. He already has a Gopro 360 camera but the lens got scratched and he can’t find any replacement parts for it. As far as the hero function he prefers the Gopro 8 I got him for his birthday, better FPS
customer_reviews.author: D. Vader

customer_reviews.title: Great 360 Camera, needs some app improvements.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a big improvement over it's previous version. I love the 360 videos and the versatility of having multiple cameras in one. The biggest issue I have is with the app and the exporting of photos from video. It doesn't allow you to export a still image, only a 360 picture. The other downside is the reduced pixel ratio for photos and hero mode. I suspect they will be improving this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mcbeth1121

customer_reviews.title: Camera might be ok but software is unusable
customer_reviews.text: None of the software works on pc and mid range phones. I was able to extract video once and then kept getting black screens. in order to get GPS overlays, I had to extract, use a website to extract GPS and then use a competitors software. Windows accounts for most of the pcs and their apps crashes and locks up making this product unusable. I thought gopro was the industry standard! Can't see how with such crappy software.
customer_reviews.author: JCBiker

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with GO PRO REMOTE
customer_reviews.text: I'll change my review when they add RE ADD a feature that has been a staple of go pro since the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: T.S.

customer_reviews.title: A nice toy, but not ready for prime time
customer_reviews.text: Stick with the Hero 8. Both the software and the camera leave much to be desired. Basically it is a pain in the neck for Windows users. You need multiple pieces of software. While the GoPro videos and promotions make it look easy to use, it is not. This is an over-priced toy.... just that, a toy. After months, they still do not have acceptable software for Windows and they continue to blame the operating system rather than take responsibility for a failed release. This has caused me to reconsider any future purchases of GoPro equipment. They need to do the right thing and own up to there failures.
customer_reviews.author: P. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera! 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and so far I'm thoroughly impressed. The picture quality is great, the 360 shots are amazing, it's super easy to use and I like that you can save the videos as mp4s. It turned out really useful for work in capturing 360 views of our offices. It works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Reviews

customer_reviews.title: No Windows Software
customer_reviews.text: Nice design however , had to return since there is no windows software at this time. I will continue to use my GoPro Fusion for now. Not ready for prime time yet.
customer_reviews.author: audigo

customer_reviews.title: If you’re a pro don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: No joking this was my 4 th go pro I bought from amazon that has major problem for an expensive camera. All has problems. I might have to find another alternative to 360 videos. No sound on most camera or white noise .. no sound being play back. What a bummer. This one going back 500 dallor not worth a dime
customer_reviews.author: Hotdeals

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! But needs more work for integration with other platforms
customer_reviews.text: The photo and video quality are just amazing! and it is super easy to get used to and use all its capabilities. However, I still find it challenging if I want to share something with my family on WhatsApp or with friends on Instagram. The support for third party platforms just lagging behind big deal!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Ali

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice but you need to improve mobile app on live streams etc. (you can use only facebook)
customer_reviews.author: Esat K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and stabilization
customer_reviews.text: Great looking 360 footage and stabilization. I have a 4K edit driving over the Salt Flats over on YouTube under the FreeWheel channel ( make sure to select the 4K option in your YouTube settings if its not preselected ). It was all shot handheld out the sunroof using the flat color profile at -1 stop and 24fps. Color and editing was done in HitFilm Pro. Still surprised at how well the stabilization worked. The beta GoPro Windows software worked flawlessly in converting the 360 footage to ProRes on a dell laptop. The touchscreen becomes intuitive over time, but controlling the camera through the iOS app is even easier.
customer_reviews.author: Christophe Davies

customer_reviews.title: Nice second-generation 360 camera, very versatile, but still no 4k output.
customer_reviews.text: The versatile modes for the camera were good to explore and the images reasonably sharp. I was disappointed this generation still can't produce 4k video but the 360 stitching is pretty well done. I worry about rubbery surface finish, which may get sticky in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: E. Halley

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to use for recording...Editing is a challenge
customer_reviews.text: There is not a good easy way to edit with windows OS.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Never use it
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Never did figure it out. One time i did use it and the battery never lasted. People love them, but i do not.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Broadwater

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 360 camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this 360 camera I was using the insta360 that everyone loves but honestly this one is better
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fisch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera puts viewers in the video
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use camera and useful app to edit videos.
customer_reviews.author: George Davis

customer_reviews.title: interesting but not so useful
customer_reviews.text: It is a very special camera and pretty interesting. But quality of camera is pretty bad for this price Not so useful for me
customer_reviews.author: Aramhwang

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My son went nuts over this gift. He loves it!! He’s using it to document his ski jumps and adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie C.

customer_reviews.title: Good but it sucks underwater
customer_reviews.text: It does de job and 360 function is pretty good but the camera sucks underwater
customer_reviews.author: Jonhattan Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: GoPro is the best.......made in USA.
customer_reviews.text: 360 photos and videos are enjoyable for amateur family photography.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: Close, but not quite.
customer_reviews.text: Needs support for external audio. Needs to support keyframes on clips over 8 min. Why does GoPro always snatch defeat from the jaws of victory?
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Really Champ on quickly and furious on send the mail to my place. Everything's there and loves it and very useful for my filmmaker in futures as freelance. God bless you.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Was never able to use because the battery would dye fast
customer_reviews.author: joe l.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 360 video quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing camera I like the video quality easy to edit and share it
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Ghassan Mulla Ali

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 360 Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love using this when I go on trips. You are always sure to catch a good angle of whatever you're doing and the transitions to interest points is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Macier

customer_reviews.title: Not For Android Users!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are on Android, avoid like the plague. GoPro rushed the Max to market without the features you get on IOS, like auto-ease. It is now two months from release and we still don't have this feature. The Android app also has major stability issues, 80% of my attempts to render a clip result in the a complete lockup, making it nearly impossible to edit and share your footage. Should have waited for the soon to be released next generation Insta 360 oneX. They at least support their Android users.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R

customer_reviews.title: Great Adventure Camera..!
customer_reviews.text: 3 days using the camera Excellent camera... I wish the lens protector would be more easy to take off... The app works well... touch screen is a plus, very easy to manage and personaliza...Definitely I would recommend this camera...specially for 360 fans!
customer_reviews.author: Camilo

customer_reviews.title: Good but not good
customer_reviews.text: The 360 saved my skin on a job I had to shoot, but you can't zoom in very far and keep the quality up, especially when I am finishing in 4K. The Hero mode is pretty pointless at only 1080p (unless you're just using it as a dash cam :) ). Good camera and it did save my job but I will find another way to do these kinds of jobs unless it's just a social or web based (lower than 1080p) production.
customer_reviews.author: rotorshawn

customer_reviews.title: Catches everything
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing. It catches everything. Even things that I didn't notice in real time. It will be better when the windows player is released but in the mean time I use a virtual machine that runs macOS.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Meador Jr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this GO PRO He's always going on some adventure and this camera and app captures every second. It is easy to use and very tough in any situation.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Wish I'd looked up the software reviews before buying this. Windows 10 file exporter will not work at all. Complete garbage. Support forums are full of people with the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: The cámara is so good
customer_reviews.text: the camera is so good. if in 6 days since I bought it they did not send it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, never worked properly. Returned directly to GoPro who is replacing unit; lengthy wait time...looking at other options currently. Would not buy another GoPro product due to this experience. 2 Thumbs down! :-(
customer_reviews.author: jkcoda007

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed using this. Lots of great features. Easy to setup and use. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: First GoPro. This is very easy to use and so far in love with the stabilization and image quality
customer_reviews.author: AC in SA

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: First gopro I own and it is SUPER easy to use. The app works like magic and it has great quality. I am very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Llamas

customer_reviews.title: I won't travel without this again
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool, the video quality and super wide lense is awesome. I've never had a GoPro before this but I love all the different capabilities and ways I can mount it and use it underwater
customer_reviews.author: Confidenceincurves

product_meta.title: GoPro MAX — Waterproof 360 + Traditional Camera with Touch Screen Spherical 5.6K30 HD Video 16.6MP 360 Photos 1080p Live Streaming Stabilization
product_meta.description:
Style:BaseClassic Hero-style skills. Spherical-capture wizardry. Unbreakable stabilization. Make way for Max, the most creative GoPro ever. Capture traditional GoPro video and photos or shoot 360 footage of everything around you. Snap a panoramic shot without having to pan— Just point and click. Choose a digital lens to capture your footage exactly how you imagine it. And with six mics onboard, you get immersive 360 audio and the best sound we’ve ever delivered.

What's in the box:

GoPro Max Camera
Rechargeable Battery
Curved Adhesive Mount
2 Protective Lenses
2 Lens Caps
Microfiber Bag
Mounting Buckle + Thumb Screw
USB-C Cable. Removeable Battery (1600mAH Lithium-Ion).
feature_bullets: Three Cameras in One: Maximize your creative freedom. With MAX you can shoot traditional Hero-style video and photos or capture immersive 360 footage. Vlog to the max with shotgun-mic performance and a front-facing screen
Max HyperSmooth: MAX gives you unbreakable stabilization by using 180-degree capture as the ultimate buffer

Live Streaming in 1080p: Shoot in HERO mode and share while you’re there. Live stream in 1080p on social, get Max HyperSmooth stabilization as you broadcast via the GoPro app and save footage to your SD card to check out later
Horizon Leveling: In HERO mode, game-changing horizon leveling gives you that silky-smooth cinematic look whether you're getting sideways, flipping through the air or chasing your kids

PowerPano: Pano without the pan. Take incredible 270-degree distortion-free panoramic photos without having to scan the horizon. Take PowerPano selfies, action shots and vertical pics—all with a level horizon
Premium 360 + Stereo Audio: Six mics capture true-to-life 360 audio and deliver the best stereo sound ever from a GoPro
Digital Lenses: Choose from four digital lenses in HERO mode to get the shot. Capture video and photos in Narrow, Linear, Wide and Max SuperView—our widest view yet

Max TimeWarp: Capture super stabilized time lapse videos while moving through an activity. In HERO mode, automatically adjust speed based on motion, scene detection and lighting. Slow down to real time—savoring moments—and then tap to speed it back up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars221 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
